title.rendered: 10 Year Anniversary + New Books + Ladies’ Night Out

content.rendered:
10 Years of Gottwals Books

This month marks the 10 year anniversary of Gottwals Books. We have a lot of fun stuff planned…10 days of promos! To kick it off, there will be a ribbon-cutting on 3/28 at the Warner Robins store with the Robins Regional Chamber and Mayor Randy Toms. We’ll announce more details next week!

 

New Books!

We have an amazing selection of used titles but we also stock new books. Check out some of the popular titles hitting our shelves this week!

 

Warehouse Update

The new headquarters is really coming together! Glass doors and windows were installed this week and we’re almost done painting.

 

Ladies’ Night Out

Pick up your tickets for Middle Georgia’s 12th annual Ladies’ Night Out at any Gottwals Books location! This event benefits the pro-life adoption ministry Covenant Care Adoptions.

The event will feature Babbie Mason who is a performer, speaker, and author. The event is Thursday, March 23rd, at 7:00 p.m. Visit their website (link below) for more information.

https://www.covenantcareadoptions.com/event/ladies-night-babbie-mason/
